attributes.action: Give me five hundred million pounds, of which i will give to people i like and myself to buy cool stuff
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I am proposing that the UK government give me Five Hundred Million pounds, to be used as i please. I will not be greedy and i will give it to people i Like as presents. I will buy them gifts and open up a little chillout pad where we can all go and relax. This pad will have a bar, ping pong and loads of rooms so everyone can stay over. Please take this petition seriously...

Thanks J Holland

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
